name: Intelehealth
description: Multichannel Telemedicine solutions for last mile population

sdgs.relevance: We as an organization align with three UN Sustainable Development Goals in our bid to provide holistic and integrated healthcare services through telemedicine to the last mile population where there is no doctor.

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is collected and stored but NOT distributed.
dataPrivacySecurity.dataPrivacySecurity: Risk Assess and Risk Treatment Plan - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1szWmJSUI9yZgJogTsxyQQAfAzIRVmqBi/edit#gid=391261868 All data transfer through HTTPS (SSL) & user level security is maintained through SHA-512 encryption with roles & privileges. Privacy policy - https://intelehealth.org/privacy-policy/

userContent.contentManagement: Content is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.
